msg: Following up r39157, clean up arguments of all the working copy editors
to consistently take use a working copy context, anchor_abspath and
target_basename. Update the revision crawler to just take a single
This has the nice side effect of making 'svn status' access batton free!
(svn_client_status5): Remove access batons; calculate open path locally
(svn_wc_revision_status2): Remove access batons and updated caller.
(make_editor): Accept context and abpaths and retrieve access batons.
